meanings.definition: A large outdoor board for displaying advertisements.
meanings.sent1: The billboards along the highway show colorful ads.
meanings.sent2: Drivers often look at billboards to learn about new products.
meanings.sent3: The billboard wearing a funny hat made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The row of billboards stood tall like silent messengers.
meanings.sent5: The bright lights on the billboards at night were like stars on the ground.

meanings.sent3: I will billboards my new business on the biggest sign I can find!
meanings.sent4: She billboards her latest movie on the largest billboard in town.
meanings.sent5: The politician decided to billboards his campaign on the busiest street in the city.
